lead_paragraph: Paris St Germain will be without influential full back Serge Aurier but Javier Pastore is available to return in Tuesday's Champions League game at Basel.

headline.print_headline: Aurier Out for PSG but Pastore Available Again
headline.main: Aurier Out for PSG but Pastore Available Again

snippet: Paris St Germain will be without influential full back Serge Aurier but Javier Pastore is available to return in Tuesday's Champions League game at Basel....
